formulas.name: AssigneebyType
formulas.expression: IF(CONTAINS({!Request_TypeRdo} ,"LOCATE"), {!Get_Group_For_Com_Content_Creation.Id} , IF(CONTAINS({!Request_TypeRdo} , "REVIEW"), {!Get_KarenS.Id}, IF(CONTAINS({!Request_TypeRdo} ,"CREATE"), {!Get_Group_For_Com_Content_Creation.Id}, IF(CONTAINS({!Request_TypeRdo} , "PROMOTE"),{!Get_Group_For_Com_Content_Creation.Id}, IF(CONTAINS({!Request_TypeRdo} , "UPDATE"),{!Get_Group_For_Com_Content_Creation.Id}, IF(CONTAINS({!Request_TypeRdo} , "IMPORT"),{!Get_Group_For_Com_Content_Creation.Id}, IF(CONTAINS({!Request_TypeRdo} , "DESIGN"), {!Get_Group_For_Com_Content_Creation.Id}, {!BillF})))))))

formulas.name: CombinedGraphicDesc
formulas.expression:
"Design Description: " &{!DesignRequestGraphicDescription} &BR() & "List 3 Adj: " & {!DesignReqPlease_list_three} &BR() & "Project Goal: " & {!DesignReqGoal} &BR() & "Target Audience: " & {!DesignTarget_Audience} &BR() & "What is being produced: " & {!PKLSTDesignWhatProducing} & "-" & {!Please_SpecifyOtherProducing} &BR() & "File Types: " & {!DesignFileTypes} &BR() & "3 design examples/inspiration: " & {!Design_Inspiration_br}&BR() &
{!Is_copyedit} & BR() & "Dept to be charged: " & {!Department_to_be_Charged} & BR() & "Functional Team: " & {!Functional_Team} & BR() & "Grant: " & {!Grant}

formulas.description: Pushes all weird import fields into a single description
formulas.name: CombinedImportDesc
formulas.expression: "Email Project Type: " & {!EmailProjectType}& BR() & "Email Topic: " & {!TopicEmail}& BR() & "Email Summary/Overview: " & {!ImportSummaryOverview}& BR() & "Audiences: " & {!AudienceImport}& " " & {!ImportOther_Audience_Type} & BR() & "Titles to include: " & {!Job_Titles_to_include_Select_all_that_apply} & " " & {!TitlestoincludeOther}& BR() & "Geographic Area: " & {!ImportGeoArea} & BR() & "Other parameters : " & {!ImportOtherparameters} & BR() & "Info needed: " & {!Information_Needed_Select_all_that_apply}& " " & {!Other_Info_Please_specify}& BR()

formulas.description: Compacts Design Request for Case Subject
formulas.name: DesignSubject
FRMCombinedWebsiteDescription
formulas.expression: "Current Challenge: " & {!Websitechallengeopp} &BR() & "Currently doing to address: " & {!WEBSITEWhat_are_you_currently_doing_to_address_this} & BR() & "Strategic Advantage: " & {!WEBSITEWhat_are_the_strategic_or_competitive_advantages_driving_this_request}& BR() & "How does this request align with website objectives: " & {!How_does_this_request_align_with_website_objectives_check_all_that_apply}& BR() & "What data illuminates or substantiates this need? : " & {!What_data_illuminates_or_substantiates_this_need}& BR() & "What data suggests this request will solve the problem? : " & {!What_data_suggests_this_request_will_solve_the_problem}& BR() & "How will this request increase revenue or efficiencies?: " & {!How_does_this_request_align_with_website_objectives_check_all_that_apply}& BR() & "What will be achieved once this request is implemented?: " & {!What_will_be_achieved_once_this_request_is_implemented}& BR() & "Links to similar website pages (for inspiration!): " & {!Links_to_similar_website_pages_for_inspiration}& BR() & "Key internal stakeholders to consult: " & {!Key_internal_stakeholders_to_consult}& BR() & "Anything else we should know: "

formulas.description: Calculates the date based on timeline selection
formulas.name: FRMExpectedDateForm
formulas.expression:
IF ( CONTAINS({!TimeLineFrm},"Urgent") , TODAY() +1, IF ( CONTAINS({!TimeLineFrm},"Express") , TODAY() +5, IF ( CONTAINS({!TimeLineFrm},"Fast") , TODAY() +15, IF ( CONTAINS({!TimeLineFrm},"Looking") , TODAY() +31
,NULL ))))

formulas.name: FRMExpectedImportDateFrom
formulas.expression: IF ( CONTAINS({!TmLnFormImport},"Fast") , TODAY() +15, IF ( CONTAINS({!TmLnFormImport},"Looking") , TODAY() +31 ,NULL ))

fields.name: Design_Inspiration_br
fields.fieldText:
Design Inspiration:
Inspire us! Please list up to 3 examples of designs we can use as inspiration. These can be both existing internal designs or designs from competitors, publications, etc.

fields.fieldText: Please provide links to final copy/content.

fields.name: Is_copyedit
fields.fieldText: Is copy editing needed?

fields.name: DesignDueDate
fields.fieldText: When does this design need to be ready to use?

validationRule.errorMessage: Please choose a date greater or equal to {!FRMExpectedDateForm}, or go back and select a different timeline.
